attributes.action: Inquiry into the quality of private student housing
attributes.background: Students are being exploited in terms of the quality of housing and estate agents need to be held to greater account!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about privately provided student accommodation, but it's not clear what you want a public inquiry to investigate or achieve.
                
You could start a new petition explaining clearly why you want a public inquiry and what this should investigate.
